title: I want to add my friend
body:
HI..
I want add my best friend the game name call "goodboy17". I have tried to find him.but cant find. please help me to add him

replies.body: Hmmmmm strange, I wasn't actually able to find any Summoner's on the NA region with that Summoner Name. My best guesses are to make sure it's spelled correctly and that they are on the NA region as well, since you can't add friends from a different region than yourself.
